original_text: The leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law heard this. And they thought about how they could kill Jesus. They were afraid of him. That was because all the crowd were listening to him. And the things that he taught caused the crowd to be very surprised.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 서기관들이 듣고 예수를 어떻게 죽일까 하고 꾀하니 이는 무리가 다 그의 교훈을 놀랍게 여기므로 그를 두려워함일러라

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law heard this.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들과 율법 교사들의 지도자들이 이것을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And they thought about how they could kill Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 어떻게 예수를 죽일 수 있을지 생각했습니다.

sentences.original_text: That was because all the crowd were listening to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 군중이 그의 말을 듣고 있었기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: And the things that he taught caused the crowd to be very surprised.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 가르친 것들이 군중을 매우 놀라게 했습니다.
